title: Musician
data:
The **Musician** is a [role](/wiki/Role "Role") in the variant [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

The Musician first appeared in an early version of [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") ([NetHack-- 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack--_3.0.10 "NetHack-- 3.0.10")) but was dropped from the code at the time the [quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") branch was ported into that variant.

The Musician's main advantage is its starting inventory, consisting of every type of magical [musical instrument](/wiki/Musical_instrument "Musical instrument").

Neutral doppelgänger, incantifiers, humans, elves, gnomes, hobbits, and nymphs can be Musicians.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Skills](#Skills)
- [2 Intrinsics](#Intrinsics)
- [3 Starting equipment](#Starting_equipment)
- [4 Rank titles](#Rank_titles)
- [5 Quest](#Quest)
- [6 Gods](#Gods)
- [7 History](#History)
- [8 References](#References)
- [9 See also](#See_also)

## Skills

NetHack-- 3.0.10 was based on [NetHack 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10"), which predated the [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill") system, so Musicians could use any weapons.

SLASHTHEM gives the Musician a skill set modeled on the [Bard](/wiki/Bard "Bard")'s (including the ability to use [music](/wiki/Bard#Musicalize_spell "Bard")):

| Musician skills |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Max             | Skills                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| Basic           | - *Weapons:* [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife"), [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword"), [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar"), [flail](/wiki/Flail "Flail"), [polearms](/wiki/Polearms "Polearms"), [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear")
- *Spells:* [body](/wiki/Body_spells "Body spells") |
| Skilled         | * *Weapons:* [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger"), [club](/wiki/Club "Club"), [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff"), [javelin](/wiki/Javelin "Javelin"), [sling](/wiki/Sling "Sling")
* *Spells:* [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment_spells "Enchantment spells")                   |
| Expert          | - *Weapons:* [dart](/wiki/Dart "Dart")
- *Combat:* [bare hands](/wiki/Bare_hands "Bare hands"), [musicalize spell](/wiki/Bard#Musicalize_spell "Bard")                                                                                                                                  |

The Musician's [special spell](/wiki/Special_spell "Special spell") is [cause fear](/wiki/Cause_fear "Cause fear"). Spell success is determined by [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence").

- SLASHTHEM u\_init.c line 2144 in v. 0.8

## Intrinsics

- XL 7: [Stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth")

## Starting equipment

- A +0 [fedora](/wiki/Fedora "Fedora")
- A +2 [Hawaiian shirt](/wiki/Hawaiian_shirt "Hawaiian shirt")
- A [magic flute](/wiki/Magic_flute "Magic flute")
- A [magic harp](/wiki/Magic_harp "Magic harp")
- A [drum of earthquake](/wiki/Drum_of_earthquake "Drum of earthquake")
- A [frost horn](/wiki/Frost_horn "Frost horn")
- A [fire horn](/wiki/Fire_horn "Fire horn")

In SlashTHEM, Musicians start with a tame [little dog](/wiki/Little_dog "Little dog") or [kitten](/wiki/Kitten "Kitten").

## Rank titles

SLASHTHEM has a slightly different set of rank titles:

- XL 1-2: Whistler
- XL 3-5: Drummer
- XL 6-9: Fiddler
- XL 10-13: Singer
- XL 14-17: Entertainer
- XL 18-21: Concertist
- XL 22-25: Meistersinger/Primadonna
- XL 26-29: Conductor
- XL 30: Virtuoso

SlashTHEM role.c line 946

## Quest

| @ Draco the Sharpshooter [File:Draco the Sharpshooter.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Draco_the_Sharpshooter.png "File:Draco the Sharpshooter.png") |                                                                                                |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                          | Weapon 4d8, Weapon 4d8, [Gaze](/wiki/Gaze "Gaze") 1d2 [paralysis](/wiki/Paralysis "Paralysis") |
|                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                |

| @ Draco the Sharpshooter [File:Draco the Sharpshooter.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Draco_the_Sharpshooter.png "File:Draco the Sharpshooter.png")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Weapon 4d8, Weapon 4d8, [Gaze](/wiki/Gaze "Gaze") 1d2 [paralysis](/wiki/Paralysis "Paralysis") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 30                                                                                             |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 15                                                                                             |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | -10                                                                                            |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 0                                                                                              |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | -15 (chaotic)                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | unique                                                                                         |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | no                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 1450                                                                                           |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | 400                                                                                            |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | medium                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | [petrification resistance](/wiki/Petrification_resistance "Petrification resistance")          |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | none                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                |
| Draco the Sharpshooter:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food. |                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | [monst.c, line 6891](/wiki/Source:Monst.c#line6891 "Source:Monst.c")                           |

The [quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") is a copy of the [Jedi quest](/wiki/Jedi_quest "Jedi quest"), but with lots of [elves](/wiki/Human_or_elf "Human or elf"); it sees the Musician fighting [Draco the Sharpshooter](/index.php?title=Draco_the_Sharpshooter\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Draco the Sharpshooter (page does not exist)") for the [Harp of Harmony](/index.php?title=Harp_of_Harmony\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Harp of Harmony (page does not exist)"), a lawful [magic harp](/wiki/Magic_harp "Magic harp") which grants [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning"), [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth"), and [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance") while carried, and speaks a random [rumor](/wiki/Rumor "Rumor") when played. It can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") to [tame](/wiki/Tame "Tame") monsters.

- SlashTHEM artilist.h line 674

## Gods

The Musician's gods are Melnibonean, drawn from Michael Moorcock's fantasy series starring [Elric of Melniboné](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elric_of_Melnibon%C3%A9) (the source also of [Stormbringer](/wiki/Stormbringer "Stormbringer")):

- Lawful: Donblas
- Neutral: Grome
- Chaotic: [Arioch](/wiki/Arioch "Arioch")

## History

The Musician's first appearance was in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") precursor [NetHack-- 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack--_3.0.10 "NetHack-- 3.0.10"), as one of nine new roles in addition to the twelve in [the contemporary version of NetHack](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10"). The discussion thread in which the authors first announced the variant suggests that some of the new roles were taken from a list proposing a role for every letter of the alphabet. See [here](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.hack/jg8YtQX1M3Y/tbBlteXdYY8J) for the relevant post.

After the release of [NetHack 3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3") in 1993, NetHack-- was updated to [NetHack-- 3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack--_3.1.3 "NetHack-- 3.1.3") by porting some of the changes from NetHack-- 3.0.10 into a patch for the newest version. Due to some changes in the vanilla code, however, some content was removed to improve compatibility with NetHack. Most significantly, NetHack 3.1 had seen the addition of the [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") branch. To avoid the challenge of fitting full-length quests for the roles that had been added in NetHack-- 3.0.10 into the patch code, those roles were simply left out of the patch.

The Musician role, along with the other eight new roles in NetHack-- 3.0.10, made its reappearance in the variant SlashTHEM.

## References

- NetHack-- 3.0.10 attrib.c line 77
- NetHack-- 3.0.10 u\_init.c line 195

## See also

- [Bard](/wiki/Bard "Bard") - another music-themed role, from a patch to NetHack 3.4.3
html:
Musician

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The Musician is a role in the variant SlashTHEM.

The Musician first appeared in an early version of SLASH'EM (NetHack-- 3.0.10) but was dropped from the code at the time the quest branch was ported into that variant.

The Musician's main advantage is its starting inventory, consisting of every type of magical musical instrument.

Neutral doppelgänger, incantifiers, humans, elves, gnomes, hobbits, and nymphs can be Musicians.

Contents

  • 1 Skills
  • 2 Intrinsics
  • 3 Starting equipment
  • 4 Rank titles
  • 5 Quest
  • 6 Gods
  • 7 History
  • 8 References
  • 9 See also

Skills

NetHack-- 3.0.10 was based on NetHack 3.0.10, which predated the skill system, so Musicians could use any weapons.

SLASHTHEM gives the Musician a skill set modeled on the Bard's (including the ability to use music):

Musician skills
Max Skills
Basic
  • Weapons: knife, short sword, scimitar, flail, polearms, spear
  • Spells: body
Skilled
  • Weapons: dagger, club, quarterstaff, javelin, sling
  • Spells: enchantment
Expert
  • Weapons: dart
  • Combat: bare hands, musicalize spell

The Musician's special spell is cause fear. Spell success is determined by intelligence.

  • SLASHTHEM u_init.c line 2144 in v. 0.8

Intrinsics

  • XL 7: Stealth

Starting equipment

  • A +0 fedora
  • A +2 Hawaiian shirt
  • A magic flute
  • A magic harp
  • A drum of earthquake
  • A frost horn
  • A fire horn

In SlashTHEM, Musicians start with a tame little dog or kitten.

Rank titles

SLASHTHEM has a slightly different set of rank titles:

  • XL 1-2: Whistler
  • XL 3-5: Drummer
  • XL 6-9: Fiddler
  • XL 10-13: Singer
  • XL 14-17: Entertainer
  • XL 18-21: Concertist
  • XL 22-25: Meistersinger/Primadonna
  • XL 26-29: Conductor
  • XL 30: Virtuoso

SlashTHEM role.c line 946

Quest

@ Draco the Sharpshooter File:Draco the Sharpshooter.png
Attacks Weapon 4d8, Weapon 4d8, Gaze 1d2 paralysis
@ Draco the Sharpshooter File:Draco the Sharpshooter.png
Attacks

Weapon 4d8, Weapon 4d8, Gaze 1d2 paralysis

Base level 30

Speed 15
Base AC -10
Base MR 0
Alignment -15 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) unique
Genocidable no
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances petrification resistance
Resistances conveyed none

Draco the Sharpshooter:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
Reference monst.c, line 6891

The quest is a copy of the Jedi quest, but with lots of elves; it sees the Musician fighting Draco the Sharpshooter for the Harp of Harmony, a lawful magic harp which grants warning, stealth, and drain resistance while carried, and speaks a random rumor when played. It can be invoked to tame monsters.

  • SlashTHEM artilist.h line 674

Gods

The Musician's gods are Melnibonean, drawn from Michael Moorcock's fantasy series starring Elric of Melniboné (the source also of Stormbringer):

  • Lawful: Donblas
  • Neutral: Grome
  • Chaotic: Arioch

History

The Musician's first appearance was in SLASH'EM precursor NetHack-- 3.0.10, as one of nine new roles in addition to the twelve in the contemporary version of NetHack. The discussion thread in which the authors first announced the variant suggests that some of the new roles were taken from a list proposing a role for every letter of the alphabet. See here for the relevant post.

After the release of NetHack 3.1.3 in 1993, NetHack-- was updated to NetHack-- 3.1.3 by porting some of the changes from NetHack-- 3.0.10 into a patch for the newest version. Due to some changes in the vanilla code, however, some content was removed to improve compatibility with NetHack. Most significantly, NetHack 3.1 had seen the addition of the Quest branch. To avoid the challenge of fitting full-length quests for the roles that had been added in NetHack-- 3.0.10 into the patch code, those roles were simply left out of the patch.

The Musician role, along with the other eight new roles in NetHack-- 3.0.10, made its reappearance in the variant SlashTHEM.

References

  • NetHack-- 3.0.10 attrib.c line 77
  • NetHack-- 3.0.10 u_init.c line 195

See also

  • Bard - another music-themed role, from a patch to NetHack 3.4.3

The '''Musician''' is a [[role]] in the variant [[SlashTHEM]].

The Musician first appeared in an early version of [[SLASH'EM]] ([[NetHack-- 3.0.10]]) but was dropped from the code at the time the [[quest]] branch was ported into that variant.

The Musician's main advantage is its starting inventory, consisting of every type of magical [[musical instrument]].

Neutral doppelgänger, incantifiers, humans, elves, gnomes, hobbits, and nymphs can be Musicians.

==Skills==
NetHack-- 3.0.10 was based on [[NetHack 3.0.10]], which predated the [[skill]] system, so Musicians could use any weapons. 

SLASHTHEM gives the Musician a skill set modeled on the [[Bard]]'s (including the ability to use [[Bard#Musicalize spell|music]]):

{| class="prettytable"
! colspan="2" style="font-size:larger" | Musician skills
|-
! Max !! Skills
|-
| Basic
|
* ''Weapons:'' [[knife]], [[short sword]], [[scimitar]], [[flail]], [[polearms]], [[spear]]
* ''Spells:'' [[body spells|body]]
|-
| Skilled
|
* ''Weapons:'' [[dagger]], [[club]], [[quarterstaff]], [[javelin]], [[sling]]
* ''Spells:'' [[enchantment spells|enchantment]]
|-
| Expert
|
* ''Weapons:'' [[dart]]
* ''Combat:'' [[bare hands]], [[Bard#Musicalize spell|musicalize spell]]
|}

The Musician's [[special spell]] is [[cause fear]].  Spell success is determined by [[intelligence]].

*SLASHTHEM u_init.c line 2144 in v. 0.8

==Intrinsics==
* XL 7: [[Stealth]]

==Starting equipment==
* A +0 [[fedora]]
* A +2 [[Hawaiian shirt]]
* A [[magic flute]]
* A [[magic harp]]
* A [[drum of earthquake]]
* A [[frost horn]]
* A [[fire horn]]

In SlashTHEM, Musicians start with a tame [[little dog]] or [[kitten]].

==Rank titles==
SLASHTHEM has a slightly different set of rank titles:

* XL 1-2: Whistler
* XL 3-5: Drummer
* XL 6-9: Fiddler
* XL 10-13: Singer
* XL 14-17: Entertainer
* XL 18-21: Concertist
* XL 22-25: Meistersinger/Primadonna

* XL 30: Virtuoso

It can be [[invoke]]d to [[tame]] monsters.

==Gods==
The Musician's gods are Melnibonean, drawn from Michael Moorcock's fantasy series starring [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elric_of_Melnibon%C3%A9 Elric of Melniboné] (the source also of [[Stormbringer]]):

* Lawful: Donblas
* Neutral: Grome
* Chaotic: [[Arioch]]

==History==
The Musician's first appearance was in [[SLASH'EM]] precursor [[NetHack-- 3.0.10]], as one of nine new roles in addition to the twelve in [[NetHack 3.0.10|the contemporary version of NetHack]].  The discussion thread in which the authors first announced the variant suggests that some of the new roles were taken from a list proposing a role for every letter of the alphabet. See [https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.hack/jg8YtQX1M3Y/tbBlteXdYY8J here] for the relevant post.

After the release of [[NetHack 3.1.3]] in 1993, NetHack-- was updated to [[NetHack-- 3.1.3]] by porting some of the changes from NetHack-- 3.0.10 into a patch for the newest version.  Due to some changes in the vanilla code, however, some content was removed to improve compatibility with NetHack.  Most significantly, NetHack 3.1 had seen the addition of the [[Quest]] branch.  To avoid the challenge of fitting full-length quests for the roles that had been added in NetHack-- 3.0.10 into the patch code, those roles were simply left out of the patch.

The Musician role, along with the other eight new roles in NetHack-- 3.0.10, made its reappearance in the variant SlashTHEM.
